name: Ext_R3_ResearchSubject_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ResearchSubject.status for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ResearchSubject.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchSubject|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: candidate | enrolled | active | suspended | withdrawn | completed
element.definition: The current state of the subject.
element.comment: `ResearchSubject.status` maps to R4 `ResearchSubject.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element ResearchSubject.status is flagged IsModifier

element.short: candidate | enrolled | active | suspended | withdrawn | completed
element.definition: The current state of the subject.
element.comment: `ResearchSubject.status` maps to R4 `ResearchSubject.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Indicates the progression of a study subject through a study
